{"id":1200315647,"question_id":125,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1710142872,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1200315647/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"42.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {\n        char[] arr=s.toCharArray();\n        int i=0;\n        int j=arr.length-1;\n        while(i<j){\n            while((i<=arr.length-1)&&!((arr[i]>='a'&& arr[i]<='z')||(arr[i]>='A'&& arr[i]<='Z')||(arr[i]>='0'&& arr[i]<='9')))\n                i++;\n            while((j>=0)&&!((arr[j]>='a'&& arr[j]<='z')||(arr[j]>='A'&& arr[j]<='Z')||(arr[j]>='0'&& arr[j]<='9')))\n                j--;\n            if(i>=j)\n                break;\n            if(arr[i]>='A'&& arr[i]<='Z')\n                arr[i]+='a'-'A';\n            if(arr[j]>='A'&& arr[j]<='Z')\n                arr[j]+='a'-'A';\n            if(arr[i++]!=arr[j--])\n                return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
